answers.answer: 140 is the American measure.  divide American measure by 18 to get everbody elses number
I gooffed. The figure 5.6 was a testarone test. My glucose test was 61 - after years around 90. But thank you for the divide by 18 move.

question: my last glucose test was 5.6, (lab range  2.8 to 8). Where do these figures for 140 and so on come from in this discussion???This discussion is related to/posts/Diabetes/normal-glucose-levels/show/325337.
title: glucose tests low
